citation.case_name: Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division v. Haley

html_with_citations:
540 U.S. 1044

DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION
v.
HALEY.

No. 02-1824.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 1, 2003.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir. [Certiorari granted, ante, p. 945.]

2

Motion of respondent for appointment of counsel granted, and Eric M. Albritton, Esq., of Longview, Tex., is appointed to serve as counsel for respondent in this case.
